testcase.system-out: @OF-901 Scenario Outline: Order pop up # src/test/resources/features/order.feature:17 Given user is at login page # com.ztrain.web.steps.LoginSteps.userIsAtTheLoginPage() Element not visible after click When user is logging-in with sehajpreet2.nicholi@orperfect.com hqqps2J$ # com.ztrain.web.steps.LoginSteps.userIsLoggingInWithUsernamePassword(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) Then he should be redirected to the home page # com.ztrain.web.steps.LoginSteps.heShouldBeAtTheHomePage() https://dev-ztrain-web.vercel.app/home successfully loaded Element not visible after click When he selects I-phone PRO 256 NOIR # com.ztrain.web.steps.AddProductToCartSteps.heSelectProduct(java.lang.String) Element not visible after click And he fills in the quantity of the product to add via icons - and + # com.ztrain.web.steps.AddProductToCartSteps.heFillInTheQuantityOfTheProductToAddViaIconsAnd() Element not visible after click And he clicks on add to cart # com.ztrain.web.steps.AddProductToCartSteps.heClicksOnAdd() Element not visible to move Element not visible after click And he clicks on cart icon # com.ztrain.web.steps.OrderButtonSteps.heClicksOnCartIcon() Element not visible after click And User clicks on order button # com.ztrain.web.steps.OrderButtonSteps.userClicksOnOrderButton() Then The order validation pop-up should appear # com.ztrain.web.steps.OrderButtonSteps.theOrderValidationPopUpShouldAppear()

testcase.name: runScenario["", "Optional[As a customer I want to see my password after enter it]"](10)
testcase.system-out: @password_displayed_clear.OF-806 Scenario: # src/test/resources/features/password_displayed_clear.feature:3 Given user is at login page # com.ztrain.web.steps.LoginSteps.userIsAtTheLoginPage() When user fill in the password field "a123456" # com.ztrain.web.steps.PasswordInClearSteps.userFillInThePasswordField(java.lang.String) Element not visible after click And User clicks on the display password button to the right of the password field # com.ztrain.web.steps.PasswordInClearSteps.userClicksOnTheDisplayPasswordButtonToTheRightOfThePasswordField() Then The password is displayed in clear # com.ztrain.web.steps.PasswordInClearSteps.thePasswordIsDisplayedInClear()
